::Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus now has complete control over the Hevngjerrig puppet. He makes the puppet stretch out a bit. He has the puppet pace for a moment and then speak...

Hevngjerrin: Now we tear Rodimus Prime's life apart.

Airshadow <airly2002@...> wrote:                                  
OOC: LOL its Hevngjerrig ;)
  
  
 PErcepctor and Hydras waited to see the  result of the puppet 
    ----- Original Message ----- 
   From:    Richard    Allen 
   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
   Sent: Saturday, November 17, 2007 3:34    PM
   Subject: Re: G2
   

      ::Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus: Good. Rodimus will be distracted. Show    time.

Jhiaxus puts on the helmet and assumes control of the puppet    of...

OOC: This is embarassing but I totally forgot the character we    have a puppet of. Hate to do this Airly but what was the name and form again?    Sorry.

Airshadow <airly2002@...>    wrote:   
          
     Hydras:
      
     Hydras typed sone buttons and said " It      seems that a Unicron's minion and my old pal" he said the word pal with      scorn "Will have a... duel "
      
            -----        Original Message ----- 
       From:        Richard        Allen 
       To:        nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com  
       Sent:        Friday, November 16, 2007 10:11 PM
       Subject:        Re: G2
       

              ::Jhiaxus::

Jhiaxus takes the helmet but looks over at the        screens.

Jhiaxus: Before we start this, perhaps we should be        absolutely certain of the situation at the Atlantis Maximal base. Someone        use the sensore and tell me what I'll be sending this puppet        into.

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...>        wrote:

brain's commands are directly sent to the puppet so literally you          
will become him"
